alert.note: Alert for Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 06 at 8:20PM CDT until May 06 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL BROWN AND EAST CENTRAL COLEMAN COUNTIES... At 819 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bangs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty around 835 PM CDT. Lake Brownwood and Grosvenor around 840 PM CDT. Lake Brownwood State Park around 850 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Thrifty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
